Dialogue.Value: I have a simple request.,I need to deliver a pack of,data to Genso Square.
Whoever takes my request,should meet me near the,mansion in Genso Town.
A strange Navi has been,making passes at me lately.,this Navi for me?
Would someone strong,come catch and punish,this Navi for me?
I’ll be waiting in the main,plaza of Genso Area 2.
Um.... I wanna show pretty ice,crystal data to my sister.
If someone can collect some,for me， come to the fountain,at the University.
My relatives are holding a,NetBattling tournament soon，,but I’m not too confident
in my skills. That’s why I want,a strong sparring partner!
Please come to the Bench,Comp in the Genso Town,park if interested!
I’m taking care of a certain,acquaintance’s virus as a pet，,but I don’t have any bug
frags to feed it.,Could someone kindly spare,100 bug frags?
If you can， I’ll give you 10MB,worth of Regular Memory.
Please come to the Air Purifier,Comp in Genso University’s,office.
Please help! An awful stalker,is following me around!
The stalker is a very strong,and horrible person!
I’m waiting in City Area 1， on,the part of the lower level not,connected to the Square!
I ran up debts when the,recession hit， and now debt,collectors are after me.
Luckily， I found a way to pay,off my debt.
But with the debt collector on,my tail， it doesn’t seem like it’ll,pan out.
Could one of you help get,what I need to pay off my,debt?
I’m hiding in the Fountain,Comp， so please meet me,there.
I’m a user of a certain social,media network， and we have,a problem.
The replacement admin is,a terrible person!
Please go teach that bad,admin a lesson!
Whoever’s up to the task,should come to City Area 3!
[News Flash!] SALE [Hurry!],Super rare chips are going,for bargain-bin prices!!
I’ll be waiting in a Telephone,Comp somewhere!,First come， first served!!
If you’re too slow，,we’ll be sold out!!
I’m a Toohoo game dev， and,I’m looking to hire a 3D motion,actor.
I’ll be waiting in Eien Area 1,for an experienced NetNavi!
I have to deliver something,right away! Could someone,deliver it for me?
There will be a reward! I’m,waiting for you in the plaza in,Central City’s North District!!
My sister’s birthday is coming,up and I’m thinking about,sending her a chip.
Problem is，the chip she’d like,is a rare one and I can’t get a,hold of it.
Would some kind soul have,one in their collection?
A very grateful person will be,waiting at the Lord Usa statue,in Eien Town.
I’m a retired ex-NetAgent.
I’m thinking about retutning,to duty to help with the recent,public safety issues.
But I’m worried my skills might,have deteriorated during my,retirement.
Seeking a fierce fighter who,can put on a show and,rekindle my fighting spirit.
Find me in the TV comp of,Yagokoro General Hospital.
I’m a sprite，but I want to be a,NetNavi for a kind master.
I’ve even learned to speak,properly and am looking for,someone who can help me.
Please come to the flowerbed,comp of the house with a yellow,roof in Genso Town.
My sister is about to undergo,surgery.
I want to get her a present to,cheer her up while she’s in the,hospital.
I need help finding the perfect,present for her，I can’t come,up with anything on my own.
I’ll be on the second floor of the,Yagokoro General Hospital.
I have to think....
Are there any philosophers,out there?
Anyone who wishes to talk to,me can come to the depths of,City Area 2.
The new president of a large,company is facing some,issues.
The previous president has,hidden the secretary Navi’s,work behind strong protection.
We need a Navi with high-level,busting technique to remove,the protection.
Please come to the president’s,office in our HQ in Central City’s,North District.
